archimate:SystemSoftware.name: Message Queue System
archimate:SystemSoftware.documentation:
Message Queue System
• Purpose: Ordered message storage and delivery for reliable communication • Types: FIFO queues, priority queues, dead letter queues, delay queues • Features: Message durability, automatic retry, poison message handling, monitoring • Implementation: Queue-based workflows, batch processing, load leveling • Monitoring: Queue depth, processing rates, error rates, consumer lag • Benefits: Reliability, order preservation, error handling, performance optimization
